sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section class="privacy-group">
    <!--  @TODO make it dynamic -->
    <tab-content-grid
      :showSearch="true"
      btnSecondary="Add members"
      btnPrimary="Delete members"
      :editIcon="true"
      title="Privacy group name"
      @handleEditBtn="$emit('openModal', blogModalTypes.createPrivacyGroup)"
    >
      <!--  @TODO make it dynamic after array with groups will be added to postman  -->
      <group-component
        :name="group.title"
        :activityName="group.text"
        :date="group.date"
        v-for="(group, index) in groups"
        :key="`${group.title}-${index}`"
      />
    </tab-content-grid>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import { blogModalTypes, blogAreas } from '@/services/Blog/blog.service';
import GroupComponent from '@/components/Blog/GroupComponent';
import TabContentGrid from '../common/TabContentGrid';

export default {
  name: blogAreas.privacyGroup,
  components: {
    GroupComponent,
    TabContentGrid
  },
  data() {
    return {
      data: null,
      blogModalTypes,
      groups: [
        {
          title: 'blog name',
          text: 'Follows from',
          date: '01-24-2019, 07:21'
        },
        {
          title: 'blog name2',
          text: 'Follows from',
          date: 'December 10, 2019'
        },
        {
          title: 'blog name3',
          text: 'Follows from',
          date: 'December 10, 2019'
        },
        {
          title: 'blog name4',
          text: 'Follows from',
          date: 'December 10, 2019'
        },
        {
          title: 'blog name5',
          text: 'Follows from',
          date: 'December 31, 2019'
        },
        {
          title: 'blog name6',
          text: 'Follows from',
          date: 'December 10, 2019'
        }
      ]
    };
  }
};
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
::v-deep .tab-content {
  grid-column-gap: var(--element-margin-xl);
}
</style>
